text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $NP$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $NP$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $LM$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $NM$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $PL$ is $2x - 4$ units.
The length of the line $PN$ is $x + 5$ units.
Point $M$ lies on the line connecting $N$ and $L$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $PN$, $PL$, $PM$, $PA$, $NL$, $NM$, $LM$, and $MA$. These lines form a geometric figure.
